import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Hello, I'm Siva Phani Kumar

Software Engineer (DevOps & Frontend)

I am actively seeking new opportunities in a DevOps Engineer role, where I can apply my hands-on experience in CI/CD automation, cloud infrastructure, containerization, orchestration and system reliability.

sivaphanikumar.tech@gmail.com
6302366346
Old Guntur, Guntur District, Andhra Pradesh, India
https://www.linkedin.com/in/siva-phani-kumar/
Download Resume

Professional Experience

DevOps Engineer

DevOps Engineer at Drucare Pvt Ltd (From: Feb 2024 – Aug 2025)

I am a DevOps-focused Software Engineer currently working at a product-based health tech organization, responsible for designing, automating, and maintaining CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure for large-scale healthcare applications.

I work closely with engineering, QA, and product teams to ensure reliable deployments, high availability, and smooth operation of production systems handling critical patient and clinical data.

Platforms & Systems Supported

  • Hospital Management Information System (HMIS): Supported deployment and operations for a microservices-based healthcare platform consisting of 30–40 services across multiple environments.

What I Do

  • Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions.
  • Provision and manage AWS cloud infrastructure using Terraform (IaC), including EC2, VPC, IAM, Load Balancers, and Auto Scaling.
  • Containerize applications using Docker and deploy them on Kubernetes (EKS) to ensure scalability and high availability.
  • Configure and manage Linux (RHEL) servers, including user access, permissions, services, and troubleshooting.
  • Manage Nginx configuration, application routing, ports, and SSL/TLS certificates to support secure deployments.
  • Implement configuration management and automation using Ansible to maintain consistent environments across Dev, QA, and Production.
  • Monitor infrastructure and application health using AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus, and Grafana for proactive issue detection.
  • Support production releases, incident resolution, and system reliability, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.

Angular Developer

Angular Developer at Drucare Pvt Ltd (From: Aug 2023 – Jan 2024)

I am a passionate and detail-oriented Frontend Angular Developer currently working as a Angular Developer at a product-based health tech organization. My role focuses on building modern, scalable web applications using Angular 15, Angular Material, TypeScript, JavaScript, RxJS, and Bootstrap.

I collaborate with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and QA engineers to deliver high-quality solutions in the healthcare domain, improving accessibility and usability of patient and clinical data.

Key Projects:

  • CRM Module: Built responsive dashboards for tracking leads and customer interactions with real-time updates via WebSocket notifications.
  • Support Module: Created interfaces for ticket tracking and inter-department communication with real-time visibility.
  • Helpdesk Module: Implemented system for hospital staff to raise and track service requests with ticket assignment and audit trails.
  • Pharmacy Module: Designed interfaces for managing drug inventory and dispensing workflows to improve operational efficiency.
  • Asset Management Module: Developed screens for tracking hospital equipment with barcode/QR asset tagging and lifecycle management.

What I Do

  • Transform UI/UX designs into fully functional web applications using Angular
  • Collaborate closely with UI/UX design teams to understand design requirements and implement them precisely
  • Develop responsive and accessible user interfaces using HTML, CSS, Angular Material, and Bootstrap
  • Coordinate with backend Java teams to integrate RESTful APIs and WebSocket connections
  • Implement real-time data visualization and updates for dynamic applications
  • Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimal performance of applications

Education

Bachelor of Technology (Mechanical Engineering)

Guntur Engineering College, Guntur

April 2021

Technical Skills

AWS ( Amazon Web Services ) Linux Kubernetes Docker Terraform Ansible Shell Scripting Jenkins Github Actions Git and GitHub Monitoring Angular V15 TypeScript JavaScript HTML5 CSS3/SCSS Angular Material Bootstrap RxJS REST API Integration WebSocket Responsive Web Design Debugging Techniques

My Workflow

I take pride in delivering high-quality frontend solutions by following a collaborative approach:

  1. Receiving and analyzing design specifications from the UI/UX team
  2. Breaking down requirements into implementable components and features
  3. Developing responsive layouts and interactive components
  4. Coordinating with backend teams to establish data contracts and integration points
  5. Implementing API integrations and real-time data handling
  6. Testing functionality across different browsers and devices
  7. Refining user experience based on feedback

Languages and tools

Angular
JAVASCRIPT
TYPESCRIPT
HTML
CSS
BOOTSTRAP
JAVA
